title: Käse-Lauch-Suppe mit Hackfleisch
instructions: Preheat the oven to 175 °C (347 °F) top/bottom heat. Place the baguettes in the preheated oven and bake for about 10 minutes. Meanwhile, add the oil to a large pot. Brown the minced meat well on all sides, seasoning with salt and pepper. Clean the leeks, cut them into small rings and add them to the minced meat. Sauté for about 5 minutes. Pour in the water, add the broth cubes, and let it simmer on low heat for about 10 minutes. Stir in the cream cheese until melted. Mix in the crème fraîche and bring to a brief boil again. Season the soup well with salt, pepper, nutmeg, garlic powder, and onion powder to taste. Cut the baguettes into slices and serve with the soup.
